Course.Title: Our Classes - Choose Your Learning Path!
Course.Description: At DGameDev Academy, we offer a variety of classes designed for all levels. Whether you want to start from scratch or deepen your coding skills? We have the perfect option for you!

Question1.Q: What is the duration of the classes?
Question1.A: The duration of each class varies depending on the course. Most classes last between 4 to 12 weeks.

Question2.A: Our class ratio is 1:5, meaning one mentor for every five students. This ensures personalized attention and maximum support.

Question3.Q: What if I miss a class?
Question3.A: No worries! You can reschedule the class you missed, as long as you contact us in advance.

Question4.A: Our classes are conducted online via Zoom, so you can learn from anywhere.

Subscribe.Title: Stay Updated on
Subscribe.Subtitle: Subscribe to Get Our Latest Class Updates and Other Exciting Promos!

PrivacyPolicy.Title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.Subtitle: Dgamedev Academy is committed to protecting your privacy
PrivacyPolicy.Introduction: At Dgamedev Academy, we deeply value your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your information when you use our services.

InformationCollected.Title: Information We Collect
InformationCollected.Description: We may collect various types of information, including:

Items.Title: Personal Information
Items.Description: Name, email address, phone number, and other contact information you provide when registering or communicating with us.

Items.Title: Usage Information
Items.Description: How you use our services, including pages you visit, features you use, and actions you take.

Items.Title: Device Information
Items.Description: Data about the device you use to access our services, such as device type, operating system, and unique device identifiers.

Items.Title: Log Data
Items.Description: IP address, access times, and other diagnostic data when you use our services.

HowWeUseInformation.Title: How We Use Your Information
HowWeUseInformation.Description: We use the information we collect to:
Items: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
Process transactions and send transaction-related notifications
Send updates, notifications, announcements, and marketing materials
Respond to your requests and inquiries
Monitor and analyze trends, usage, and activities to improve our services
Detect, prevent, and address technical, security, or fraud issues

InformationDisclosure.Title: Information Disclosure
InformationDisclosure.Description: We may share your information with:

Items.Title: Service Providers
Items.Description: Companies that perform services on our behalf, such as payment processing, data analysis, email delivery, and customer support services.

Items.Title: Business Partners
Items.Description: We may share information with business partners to offer products, services, or promotions to you.

Items.Title: Legal Compliance
Items.Description: We may disclose information if required by law or in response to legitimate requests from public authorities.

DataSecurity.Title: Data Security
DataSecurity.Description: We implement security measures designed to protect your information from unauthorized access and misuse. However, no method of electronic transmission or storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

CookiesAndTracking.Title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
CookiesAndTracking.Description: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to collect and track information about your use of our services. You can control the use of cookies through your browser settings.

YourPrivacyRights.Title: Your Privacy Rights
YourPrivacyRights.Description: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights related to your personal information, including:
Items: Accessing personal data we hold about you
Requesting correction or deletion of your data
Restricting or objecting to the processing of your data
Requesting portability of your data
Withdrawing your consent at any time

PolicyChanges.Title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
PolicyChanges.Description: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "last updated" date.

ContactUs.Title: Contact Us
ContactUs.Description: If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy or data practices, please contact us at:

TermsAndConditions.Title: Terms and Conditions
TermsAndConditions.Subtitle: Terms and Conditions of DGameDevAcademy Services
TermsAndConditions.Introduction: Welcome to DGameDevAcademy! By accessing or using DGameDevAcademy services, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. Please read this entire document carefully before using our platform.

GeneralProvisions.Title: General Provisions
GeneralProvisions.Description: DGameDevAcademy provides online game development education and training services. The following terms govern the use of our services:
Items: DGameDevAcademy reserves the right to modify, suspend, or terminate services at any time without notice.
By using our services, you affirm that you are at least 18 years old or have permission from a parent or guardian if under 18 years of age.
You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and limiting access to your devices.
DGameDevAcademy reserves the right to refuse service to anyone for any reason without prior notice.

IntellectualProperty.Title: Intellectual Property Rights
IntellectualProperty.Description: Content available through DGameDevAcademy is protected by copyright and intellectual property laws:
Items: All course materials, videos, tutorials, source code, logos, trademarks, and other content are the property of DGameDevAcademy or its licensors.
You are not permitted to redistribute, sell, rent, transfer, reproduce, modify, or use DGameDevAcademy content for commercial purposes without written permission.
You may use the content for personal learning in accordance with the license terms included with course materials.
Projects you develop using skills learned from our courses are your property, but the course materials themselves remain the property of DGameDevAcademy.

ServiceDescription.Title: Service Description
ServiceDescription.Description: DGameDevAcademy provides an online educational platform focused on game development. Our services include video courses, tutorials, practical projects, discussion forums, and other learning resources. We strive to provide high-quality content, but do not guarantee that services will always be available without interruption or that all materials will be suitable for all learning needs. We continuously improve our platform's content and features in line with developments in the game industry.

UserObligations.Title: User Obligations
UserObligations.Description: As a user of DGameDevAcademy, you have the following obligations:

Items.Title: Proper Use
Items.Description: You agree to use the services in accordance with applicable laws and not to engage in illegal or harmful activities through our platform.

Items.Title: User Content
Items.Description: If you upload or share content on our platform, you are responsible for ensuring that such content does not infringe upon third-party intellectual property rights.

Items.Title: Account Security
Items.Description: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and all activities that occur under your account.

Items.Title: Community Behavior
Items.Description: You agree to interact with other users respectfully and not engage in harassment, intimidation, or discrimination.

AccountAndRegistration.Title: Account and Registration
AccountAndRegistration.Description: To access certain features on the DGameDevAcademy platform, you need to create an account. When registering, you must provide accurate and complete information. You are responsible for keeping your account information up to date. Each person may only have one account, and you are not permitted to share access to your account with others. DGameDevAcademy reserves the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms.

PaymentTerms.Title: Payment Terms
PaymentTerms.Description: Some courses and features on DGameDevAcademy may require payment. Prices are displayed in the applicable currency and include relevant taxes. Payments are processed through third-party payment service providers. By making a purchase, you agree to pay the specified amount. All payments are non-refundable unless otherwise stated in our refund policy. DGameDevAcademy reserves the right to change service prices at any time, but such changes will not affect purchases made prior to the change.

LimitationOfLiability.Title: Limitation of Liability
LimitationOfLiability.Description: DGameDevAcademy provides services 'as is' without any warranties, express or implied. We strive to provide accurate information, however:
Items: DGameDevAcademy is not responsible for losses or damages arising from the use of our services, including but not limited to direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, or punitive damages.
We do not guarantee that the platform will always be secure, error-free, or available without interruption.
DGameDevAcademy is not responsible for content created by users or third parties.
We do not guarantee that information provided in our courses is always up-to-date or accurate, although we strive to update content regularly.
In any case, DGameDevAcademy's total liability will not exceed the amount you have paid for our services in the last 12 months.

Termination.Title: Termination
Termination.Description: DGameDevAcademy reserves the right, at our sole discretion, to terminate or suspend your access to services at any time without prior notice if you violate these Terms and Conditions. You may also terminate your use of the services at any time by ceasing to use the platform and/or deleting your account. After termination, provisions that reasonably should survive will continue to apply, including provisions regarding intellectual property, limitation of liability, and dispute resolution.

GoverningLaw.Title: Governing Law
GoverningLaw.Description: These Terms and Conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Indonesia. Any disputes arising from or related to these Terms and Conditions will be resolved by courts having jurisdiction in Indonesia. If any provision of these Terms and Conditions is deemed invalid or unenforceable, that provision will be removed without affecting the remaining provisions.

ContactUs.Title: Contact Us
ContactUs.Description: If you have any questions or concerns about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us:

TagLine.TagLine: "We are committed to equipping every participant with practical skills, creativity, and confidence needed to thrive in the digital era."
